name: Thinker X400 0.2 nozzle
default_filament_profile: Eryone PLA @0.2 nozzle;Eryone ABS @0.2 nozzle;Eryone ASA @0.2 nozzle;Eryone PETG @0.2 nozzle;Eryone Silk PLA @0.2 nozzle;Eryone TPU @0.2 nozzle;Eryone ABS-CF @0.2 nozzle;Eryone ASA-CF @0.2 nozzle;Eryone PA @0.2 nozzle;Eryone PA-CF @0.2 nozzle;Eryone PA-GF @0.2 nozzle;Eryone PETG-CF @0.2 nozzle;Eryone PLA-CF @0.2 nozzle;Eryone PP @0.2 nozzle;Eryone PP-CF @0.2 nozzle;
machine_start_gcode:
M117 Heating
M104 S[first_layer_temperature] ; set extruder temp
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] ; wait for extruder temp
PRINT_START 
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
M83 ; extruder relative mode
M204 S[machine_max_acceleration_extruding] T[machine_max_acceleration_retracting]
M104 S0
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; set bed temp
M117 Heating
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]
M104 S[first_layer_temperature] ; set extruder temp
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] ; wait for extruder temp
;QUAD_GANTRY_LEVEL
CLEAN_N S=[first_layer_temperature] X=240 Y=-3 A=0 D=0.4
M117 Quad Level
_QUAD_GANTRY_LEVEL  horizontal_move_z=10 retry_tolerance=1 LIFT_SPEED=5
G28 Z
M117 Quad Level
_QUAD_GANTRY_LEVEL  horizontal_move_z=5 retry_tolerance=0.05 LIFT_SPEED=5
M117 Bed Mesh Level
G1 X132.5 Y197.5
G28 N
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE
M117 Heating
G1 X275.0 Y0.0 Z0.3 F1500 ; move print head up
M104 S[first_layer_temperature] ; set extruder temp
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] ; wait for extruder temp
M117 .
INTRO_LINE D=0.2 ;intro line with 0.2 mm nozzle
